questions.question: Let Y = a+bX be the equation of linear regression of Y on X then

answers.c: b represents the slope of line
answers.d: a represents the slope of line

questions.question: The slope of regression line of Y on X is also referred to as

answers.a: regression coefficient of X on Y
answers.b: correlation coefficient of X and Y
answers.c: regression coefficient of Y on X

questions.question: The correlation for the values of two variables moving in the same direction is
Which of the following plots is suitable for describing the linear relationship between two variables?
For a regression line passing through origin

answers.a: there is no correlation between variables
answers.d: there is no association between variables

questions.question: The method of least square used to estimate the unknown constants 'a' & 'b' used in the regression equation, Y=a+bX, minimizes:

answers.a: sum of squares different between X and Y
answers.b: sum of squares of actual and estimated values of Y
answers.c: sum of squares of difference between actual and estimated values of Y

questions.question: For two variables X and Y there can be a maximum of :
What would be the slopes of two regression lines parallel to each other?
What is the sum of squares of errors if all the actual and estimated values of Y are same?
